name: pins.add
desc:
This method pins an item (file, file comment, channel message, or group message) to a particular channel.
The channel argument is required and one of file, file_comment, or timestamp must also be specified.

channel.desc: Channel to pin the item in.

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to pin.

errors.bad_timestamp: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.
errors.file_not_found: File specified by file does not exist.
errors.file_comment_not_found: File comment specified by file_comment does not exist.
errors.message_not_found: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.
errors.channel_not_found: The channel argument was not specified or was invalid.
errors.no_item_specified: One of file, file_comment, or timestamp was not specified.
errors.already_pinned: The specified item is already pinned to the channel.
errors.permission_denied: The user does not have permission to add pins to the channel.
errors.file_not_shared: File specified by file is not public nor shared to the channel.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
